teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

ABSOLVENTA - Jobbörse für Studenten, Absolventen und Young Professionals

teams.name: Build India
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference to Power Rural India.
teams.description:
We are committed to bring prosperity to rural India as we believe that insufficient resources to make a decent living in villages is the reason that most of our villagers migrate to cities aggravating the problems of already crowded cities. We aim to develop sustainable infrastructure in villages to improve the quality of life for people in Rural India.

We are currently interested in collaborating with individuals and companies interested in expanding the concept of integrating microfinance with renewable power generation to finance utility scale solar and wind power projects in India in association with KIVA

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.description: We are a loose-knit group of classrooms from around the world that are raising money to loan out to deserving individuals and groups in the parts of the world that we are studying.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: iPeace
teams.loan_because: We care and we can
teams.description:
Sharing Peace, Making A Difference. 

iPeace is not an organization. It's an organism. It's alive, and it's made out of people; It is made from you, her him, them, us and me. It is not for profit and it is not for prestige. It is for peace. Period.


iPeace is a wiki-organism that believes in unity, sharing and love. iPeace believes in the tremendous power of people, when united together, to make a true change in the world.


Sharing Peace. Making A Difference. If each one of us makes the pledge to reduce pain in out world just by a little bit, our impact will be tremendous. Fight poverty, violence, hunger or prejudice. Help our children get better education or do something for our planet. The aggregate of the little changes will make our world more peaceful.


iPeace will be a hub to ALL peace initiatives in the world. You'll be able to come here and educate yourself about what's going on and where, and also share YOUR knowledge. We will cooperate and give support to all peace initiatives, as long as they are non violent and non profit.

teams.name: Holy Trinity
teams.description: We are 7th graders at Holy Trinity School

teams.name: SIFE Microlending
teams.loan_because: It enables us as college students to reach out and positively effect the surrounding world economically and socially.
teams.description: SIFE is a group that aims at providing economic opportunity for the surrounding community, region, and the world at large.  Our focus is to help those who want to begin to take advantage of the benefits of the free market.

teams.name: Friends of packagingarts Legacy Giving Fund
teams.loan_because: We believe in supporting entrepreneurs who follow their dreams and work hard to improve themselves and their communities. We believe in sharing the fruits of our success and giving others a chance to live healthy and full lives and to fight poverty from the ground up. We believe in people.

teams.name: Room 214 Social Media for Social Justice
teams.loan_because: We can.
teams.description: Our Values are uncompromising. We believe in measurable results, attention to detail and learning by doing. We also believe in love - and exemplify this in the work place by prioritizing compassion over corporation, and people over process. Cash is NOT king. We keep this perspective by 1) valuing our employees as partners in our business, 2) respecting our customers' businesses as much as our own, 3) contributing to social justice efforts which far outweigh the importance of what we do to pay the bills.

teams.name: Adams Global Communications
teams.loan_because: We care about our global economy and our friends around the world.
teams.description: We are a group of Cable Television Professionals that care.

teams.name: Wilkins Family
teams.loan_because: it feels great to see these entrepreneurs grow their business and pay back the loans.
teams.description: We have been enjoying growing loans from our family and friends.

teams.name: Etsy.com Handmade
teams.loan_because: we care.  We loan because we can.  We loan because we want to help other micro-entrepreneurs & because so many of us understand the struggles one must face when trying to get a small business off the ground.
teams.description: This group is for buyers, sellers, friends and fans of Etsy.com, the online marketplace for all things handmade.  We love art, crafts, design and DIY!  PLEASE NOTE: we are not sponsored by or endorsed by the staff or owners of Etsy.com.  Just enthusiast fans of the site!

teams.description: My friends and family are supporting me to make the world a better place, and what better way to do that than to have funds that keep giving back so I can help through my whole lifetime.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.description: We are a liberal church in Santa Barbara, California.

teams.name: The Lost Albatross
teams.loan_because: We believe in doing what we can to lend a helping hand to our neighbors around the world, and that through a combination of community assistance and personal responsibility, lives can be improved. We want to do our small part to make the world a better place for everyone.
teams.description: We are friends, relatives, neighbors, and even complete strangers - some of whom met through the lostalbatross.com blog.

teams.name: Prime Technical Consulting
teams.loan_because: We are a socially responsible business that believes in helping better the situation of those in need.
teams.description: Prime Technical Consulting is an information technology firm specializing in providing world class IT solutions and support to businesses and institutions.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.description: Chico State University Students, Faculty, Staff, and Friends

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Kiva U Colleges
teams.description:
Kiva U-College is an international network of microfinance clubs that gives university students an easy way to play a direct role in changing lives. Kiva U's mission is to educate students about the potential impact of microfinance, and to encourage microlending through Kiva's lending teams. 

Kiva U is world-wide and it continues to grow. In the coming school year, Kiva U will provide its chapters with the infrastructure and resources they need to establish a permanent presence on campus. The program will offer its chapters a variety of opportunities to participate in competitions and conferences, and will strongly encourage intra-university collaboration.

teams.name: Beau's All Natural Brewing Co.
teams.loan_because: Good beer can change the world.
teams.description: Our brewery is a very active member of our community and so are our customers.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

abaca              www.kiva.org/lend/479304 
bees and beehives   www.kiva.org/lend/416522 
bicycle repair   www.kiva.org/lend/422950 
bicycle sales   www.kiva.org/lend/434305
biodigesters www.kiva.org/lend/486001  
bus transportation   www.kiva.org/lend/441833
eco-friendly products   www.kiva.org/lend/369833 
electric vehicles    www.kiva.org/lend/475485
electronics repair   www.kiva.org/lend/451383
energy efficient products   www.kiva.org/lend/431717
Fair Trade (sustainably grown) coffee  www.kiva.org/lend/459274  
farm tools & equipment   www.kiva.org/lend/405404 
flowers   www.kiva.org/lend/355897

teams.name: OneWorld Sustainable
teams.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand every now and then.  Hopefully, these small loans will help provide the financial assistance needed by the individuals or groups we support so they can get beyond the challenges and hardship they currently face.
teams.description: Since 2002, OneWorld Sustainable has been providing solar energy and energy efficiency products and services for industrial, commercial, and residential clientele throughout the Southeast Region of the United States.  Considered a forerunner in the industry, OneWorld’s project portfolio includes grid-tied PV systems, solar car charging stations, educational PV, and large-scale solar farms for landowners who are interested in long-term investment opportunities.  In addition, OneWorld’s energy efficiency audits have helped hundreds of commercial and residential clients save thousands of dollars in utility expenses.  The company’s international outreach initiative includes a variety of donated and donor-funded off-grid systems installed throughout Kenya, Southern Sudan, Uganda, and Tanzania.

teams.name: The Lost Albatross
teams.loan_because: We believe in doing what we can to lend a helping hand to our neighbors around the world, and that through a combination of community assistance and personal responsibility, lives can be improved. We want to do our small part to make the world a better place for everyone.
teams.description: We are friends, relatives, neighbors, and even complete strangers - some of whom met through the lostalbatross.com blog.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Team Sherdog
teams.loan_because: Be the change you want to see in the world
teams.description: We are a group of mixed martial arts enthusiasts who enjoys helping others.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Global Romanian Professionals Network
teams.loan_because: We believe that people around the world should be given the opportunity to develop themselves and their families, whether through work or education.
teams.description:
A group of Romanian professionals around the world interested in helping others.
Acronym - GRPN
Yahoo Groups:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/GRPN

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Wilbur Dale Wilson Family
teams.loan_because: We want to improve the quality of life for families around the world.
teams.description: We are the wife, sons and their wives, grandchildren and great-grandchildren of "Jiggs" Wilson -- A man who loved and cherished his family and lived to catch fish.

teams.name: Wiccans, (neo)Pagans, Witches and fellows
teams.loan_because: It does not harm so we do as we will
teams.description:
Open team. If you're a Wiccan or a Pagan, please join and show the World we exist and we're doing well.
[logo info: www.conjure.com/inspired.html]

teams.name: Feast of 7 Fishes
teams.loan_because: Collectively, we don't have many needs. This is an opporunity for us to make a difference for someone who does.
teams.description: We are a group of friends who have met Christmas eve for the feast of 7 fishes - an Italian tradition for my husband's family.

teams.name: C.S.R.
teams.loan_because: We have enough.
teams.description: We are a student society of 230 Christian students from the Delft University of Technology.

teams.name: Team NEB
teams.loan_because: We believe in empowering budding entrepreneurs in developing countries through micro-loans.
teams.description: Employees of New England Biolabs who want to make a difference.

teams.description: Where everyone is a captain!

teams.name: Social Media Moms
teams.loan_because: We know the power moms have on the interwebs and we want to leverage that to promote entrepreneurship globally.
teams.description: A diverse group of Moms connecting on the web that network and create buzz for each others' businesses, our own businesses, and now through lending to Mom entrepreneurs via Kiva.

teams.name: Always and Forever
teams.loan_because: We believe in helping those in more difficult situations then we experience.  We believe that everyone should have a chance to live their dreams.
teams.description: We are a group of everyday people that find comfort in helping others.  Open hearts make for a better world.
